description: Make spectacular caramilk breakaway and cheesecake bars in just 3 steps. Every bite wins with layers of crunchy wafer, silky caramilk and creamy cheesecake.
name: Caramilk Breakaway Cheesecake Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm (7cm deep) square cake pan. Line with baking paper, allowing paper to extend 2cm over sides. Break chocolate into pieces and arrange over base of pan (youâ€™ll use about 28 pieces).

Place cream cheese and sugar in a large bowl. Using an electric hand mixer, beating until smooth. Spoon mixture over chocolate. Smooth top. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight, if time permits, or until set.

Roughly chop remaining chocolate pieces. Remove cheesecake from pan and transfer to a board. Drizzle over caramel sauce and arrange chocolate over top. Using a warm, sharp knife, cut into 12 pieces. Serve.
